MESSAGE.JP: 覚めは最悪だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up feeling awful.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up feeling awful.

MESSAGE.JP: いさっきまで何かとても嫌なことを考えていた気もするんだけど、起きた途端に忘れてしまう夢みたいに、もう曖昧だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Though it felt like something truly unpleasant had been bothering me until a moment ago, whatever it was had already faded just beyond recollection, as though it were a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though it felt like something truly unpleasant had been bothering me until a moment ago, whatever it was had already faded just beyond recollection, as though it were a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よう、今日は低血圧だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, you look like you have low blood pressure this morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, you look like you have low blood pressure this morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん、あんまり寝れなくてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, I couldn't get enough sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, I couldn't get enough sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人と喋っていても、ぼんやりとしたもやはなかなか晴れなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even talking to Masato wasn't making me feel any better.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even talking to Masato wasn't making me feel any better.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかしいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Something's off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Something's off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おい、そろそろ行かないとやばいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, we'd better be going now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, we'd better be going now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食後、出かける準備をしていたら、今日使うはずの教科書が見つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I started getting ready for school after breakfast, but I couldn't find a textbook I needed for one of today's classes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started getting ready for school after breakfast, but I couldn't find a textbook I needed for one of today's classes.

MESSAGE.JP: この前の授業ではあったはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I could have sworn that I had it in the last lecture.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I could have sworn that I had it in the last lecture.

MESSAGE.JP: こにやったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Where did I put it?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did I put it?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人、知らない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, any idea where it might be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, any idea where it might be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Beats me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Beats me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さか、とは思いながらも休日にしか使わない鞄も確認してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think it would be there, but just in case I checked the bag I use on weekends as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think it would be there, but just in case I checked the bag I use on weekends as well.

MESSAGE.JP: には、文庫本が三冊入っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were three paperback books inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were three paperback books inside.

MESSAGE.JP: う。目当ての教科書じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: None of them were what I was looking for.
MESSAGE.Translation: None of them were what I was looking for.

MESSAGE.JP: は次の心当たりを探そうとして…手が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to move on when I stopped cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to move on when I stopped cold.

MESSAGE.JP: のうちの一冊は、特にかなり読み込まれているように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I noticed that one of the three books looked like it had been read over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I noticed that one of the three books looked like it had been read over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな本、僕は持っていただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Did I have a book like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Did I have a book like this?

MESSAGE.JP: 間がない、とわかっていても。
MESSAGE.EN: While I knew I was running out of time,
MESSAGE.Translation: While I knew I was running out of time,

MESSAGE.JP: はその本を開こうとする手を止めることができなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but open the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but open the book.

MESSAGE.JP: らぱら、とページをめくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I flipped through the pages.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flipped through the pages.

MESSAGE.JP: み込まれた本は、うっかりするとばらけてしまいそうな危うさを持っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The worn book felt as though the pages could fall out if treated carelessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The worn book felt as though the pages could fall out if treated carelessly.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、短歌集だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a tanka poem collection.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a tanka poem collection.

MESSAGE.JP: めて背表紙を見ると、色褪せた字で『若山牧水歌集』とある。
MESSAGE.EN: I could make out the slightly blurred letters reading ❛Bokusui Wakayama Poem Collection❜ on the back of the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could make out the slightly blurred letters reading ❛Bokusui Wakayama Poem Collection❜ on the back of the book.

MESSAGE.JP: 人あたりの、手の込んだ悪戯だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: For a moment I suspected that it might have been an elaborate prank by Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a moment I suspected that it might have been an elaborate prank by Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: ラパラとページをたぐっていた指が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: After flipping through a few more pages, something stopped my finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: After flipping through a few more pages, something stopped my finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 初のページ、読み癖のついた紙が、ひっかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had reached a page with a corner creased from having been opened countless times.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had reached a page with a corner creased from having been opened countless times.

MESSAGE.JP: の心にも、何かがひっかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, I felt something tugging at my heartstrings.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, I felt something tugging at my heartstrings.

MESSAGE.JP: のページの一番はじめの歌が目に止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The very first poem on the page caught my eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: The very first poem on the page caught my eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥は哀しからずや空の青
MESSAGE.EN: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?

MESSAGE.JP: dうみのあをにも染まず
MESSAGE.EN: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched
MESSAGE.Translation: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched

MESSAGE.JP: dただよふ
MESSAGE.EN: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 名な短歌だ。国語の授業で習った覚えがある。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a famous poem which I remembered learning about in Japanese class.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a famous poem which I remembered learning about in Japanese class.

MESSAGE.JP: から、僕がこの歌を知っていても何の不思議もない。
MESSAGE.EN: So I wasn't surprised that I recognized it.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I wasn't surprised that I recognized it.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、それだけだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But was that really all?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But was that really all?

MESSAGE.JP: っと、大切な――。
MESSAGE.EN: There should be something more important...
MESSAGE.Translation: There should be something more important...

MESSAGE.JP: にか――記憶が。
MESSAGE.EN: More important... memories about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: More important... memories about it.

MESSAGE.JP: ―になりたいんです。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I wanted to become――❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I wanted to become――❜

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥に――。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛――a white bird.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛――a white bird.❜

MESSAGE.JP: りたいんです。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛That's what I was longing to be.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛That's what I was longing to be.❜

MESSAGE.JP: の歌を『希望』だと言った、女の子がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a girl who had described that poem as her ❛hope.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a girl who had described that poem as her ❛hope.❜

MESSAGE.JP: この本は、わたしそのものなんです』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛This book is myself.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛This book is myself.❜

MESSAGE.JP: の名は――。
MESSAGE.EN: Her name was――
MESSAGE.Translation: Her name was――

MESSAGE.JP: ―西園美魚。
MESSAGE.EN: ――Mio Nishizono.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Mio Nishizono.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、忘れていたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How could I have forgotten her until now!?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could I have forgotten her until now!?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人、西園さんはどうしたんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, what's happened to Nishizono-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, what's happened to Nishizono-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…西園？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Nishizono?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Nishizono?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「西園がどうかしたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is there something wrong with her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is there something wrong with her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうかしたって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, I mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最近、学校に来てないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She hasn't come to school lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She hasn't come to school lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、来ていないだけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What astonished me wasn't just the reality that she'd been absent from school for the last few days,
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What astonished me wasn't just the reality that she'd been absent from school for the last few days,

MESSAGE.JP: てないことさえ、忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: but the fact that I'd even forgotten that fact.
MESSAGE.Translation: but the fact that I'd even forgotten that fact.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうだったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気込む僕とは裏腹に、真人の返事は拍子抜けするようなものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: He answered as if it was merely a point of idle curiosity, in contrast with myself, who was thrown into complete turmoil.
MESSAGE.Translation: He answered as if it was merely a point of idle curiosity, in contrast with myself, who was thrown into complete turmoil.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…この前見かけた気がするぞ。おまえの勘違いだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I think I saw her just a while ago. You must be mistaken.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I think I saw her just a while ago. You must be mistaken.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…それよりも、今思い出したんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...By the way, I just recalled something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...By the way, I just recalled something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、何か思いだしたのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh-what is it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh-what is it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえが探してる教科書はこの前謙吾とやり合う時に、オレが勝手に借りた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The textbook you're searching for... I used it as a weapon in a fight I had with Kengo earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The textbook you're searching for... I used it as a weapon in a fight I had with Kengo earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あの教科書は勇敢に戦ってくれたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It fought valiantly by my side.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It fought valiantly by my side.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「わりい、わりい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My bad, my bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My bad, my bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なんだよ、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's not important now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's not important now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「教室に置いてあるから、行ったら返してやれる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's in the classroom. I'll give it back to you over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's in the classroom. I'll give it back to you over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さあ、早く行こうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now let's hurry up and go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now let's hurry up and go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: になることは山ほどあるけれど、真人の言葉に促されて部屋を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I had an ocean of worries, I left the room as per his suggestion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I had an ocean of worries, I left the room as per his suggestion.

MESSAGE.JP: 校に行けば、きっとはっきりする。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything should clear up once I get to school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything should clear up once I get to school.

MESSAGE.JP: う登校していた謙吾にも訊いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I questioned Kengo, who was already in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I questioned Kengo, who was already in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「西園がどうかしたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's that about Nishizono?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's that about Nishizono?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の反応も何の変哲もないものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: His reaction was very similar to Masato's.
MESSAGE.Translation: His reaction was very similar to Masato's.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんは、先週学校に来てた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did she come to school this past week?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did she come to school this past week?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人に聞いてもはっきりと覚えてないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I asked Masato, but he didn't remember for sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I asked Masato, but he didn't remember for sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「真人は三歩歩けば忘れるニワトリ頭だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He'd forget where he put his own brain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He'd forget where he put his own brain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そいつに聞いても無駄だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can't get anything out of him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can't get anything out of him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺はしっかり覚えているぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can rely on my memory.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can rely on my memory.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「西園だろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Nishizono, right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Nishizono, right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…えーと、どうだったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Well, wait a second.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Well, wait a second.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「これは決して忘れているわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I swear, it isn't that I forgot about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I swear, it isn't that I forgot about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ただ、ちょっと思い出せないだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I just can't seem to quite recall it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I just can't seem to quite recall it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それを忘れてるって言うんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's what the word ❛forget❜ means.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's what the word ❛forget❜ means.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つもの二人のやり取りも、今はいらだたしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even their usual dialogue only irritated me at the moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even their usual dialogue only irritated me at the moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cut it out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cut it out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんはどうしたのか、教えてよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just tell me what happened to her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just tell me what happened to her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…どうかしたのか、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What's the matter with you, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What's the matter with you, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうした、もなにもない。別にどうもしないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Nothing's happened to her. I'm sure she's doing fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Nothing's happened to her. I'm sure she's doing fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「確か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If I remember correctly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If I remember correctly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が何か言おうとした時、ドアの開く音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Just at the moment he was about to say something further, somebody opened up the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just at the moment he was about to say something further, somebody opened up the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「おはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の声が通る。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a brisk voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a brisk voice.

MESSAGE.JP: のざわめきの中、聞きたかった人の声がはっきりと耳に届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Through the morning babble of other classmates, I could finally single out the voice I'd been wanting to hear all along.
MESSAGE.Translation: Through the morning babble of other classmates, I could finally single out the voice I'd been wanting to hear all along.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おっ。噂をすれば、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh, speak of the devil.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh, speak of the devil.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったく普段どおりの声色をした謙吾の言葉の続きを待たずに振り向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Without waiting for Kengo's next words, I turned in the direction the voice had come from.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without waiting for Kengo's next words, I turned in the direction the voice had come from.

MESSAGE.JP: の視線の先にいたのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: The one my eyes caught was...
MESSAGE.Translation: The one my eyes caught was...

MESSAGE.JP: 園さん…じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san... no, it wasn't her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san... no, it wasn't her.

MESSAGE.JP: ている。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl there did resemble her.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl there did resemble her.

MESSAGE.JP: も、違う。
MESSAGE.EN: But she wasn't Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she wasn't Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: は知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew who she was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew who she was.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was...

MESSAGE.JP: 焼けの中で僕らの前に姿を現した、あの美鳥だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori, who had appeared right in front of us at the sunset the other day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori, who had appeared right in front of us at the sunset the other day.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「美鳥っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Midori!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Midori!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わず、大声を出してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking, I abruptly shouted out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking, I abruptly shouted out.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「やっだなあ、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝What's with you, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝What's with you, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「朝からいきなり大声出したりしたら、恥ずかしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝It's pretty embarrassing, being greeted so enthusiastically this early in the morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝It's pretty embarrassing, being greeted so enthusiastically this early in the morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: する美鳥は、平然と答える。
MESSAGE.EN: She, on the other hand, answered in a composed manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: She, on the other hand, answered in a composed manner.

MESSAGE.JP: の女子がちょっと首を傾げた後、何か意味ありげに頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Cocking her head slightly to the side, the girl next to Midori gave a meaningful nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cocking her head slightly to the side, the girl next to Midori gave a meaningful nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子@「直枝くんって意外と大胆なのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Naoe-kun seems to be more daring than I thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Naoe-kun seems to be more daring than I thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子@「西園さんが、うらやましいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝I envy you, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝I envy you, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あはは、そんなこと…あるよねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, I don't think that... isn't it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, I don't think that... isn't it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の方をちらりと見て笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She glanced toward me and laughed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She glanced toward me and laughed.

MESSAGE.JP: の後は周りの女子と一緒に、美鳥はおしゃべりを始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, Midori started chatting with the other girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, Midori started chatting with the other girls.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな、当たり前のように。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As if that was a given,
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As if that was a given,

MESSAGE.JP: 女がそこにいるのが、ずっと続いていたように。
MESSAGE.EN: as if she had been one of the class since forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: as if she had been one of the class since forever.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスに溶け込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had blended in with the rest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had blended in with the rest.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…なんだよ理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Hey, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Hey, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「西園のことを気にしていたから何かと思えば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You were so concerned about her you even made me worried...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You were so concerned about her you even made me worried...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「付き合ってられねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What a waste of time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What a waste of time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…まったくだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Indeed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Indeed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「珍しく、真人と意見の一致を見たな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hard to believe, but I share the same view as you, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hard to believe, but I share the same view as you, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな主張に、果たして誰が耳を貸すんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But just who would believe such a crazy claim?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But just who would believe such a crazy claim?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「前から、鈴と西園さんは仲良しだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you two always been friendly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you two always been friendly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…そこを理樹に訊きたかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...That's what I wanted to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...That's what I wanted to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「自分でこんなことを言うのも変だけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I know it's weird to admit this, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I know it's weird to admit this, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あまりよく覚えてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not quite sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not quite sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…今朝、教室でみおに会って、突然これまでのことを思い出したような」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...When I saw Mio in the classroom this morning, I suddenly remembered everything that had happened so far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...When I saw Mio in the classroom this morning, I suddenly remembered everything that had happened so far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そんな変な感じが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...That's the strange thing I experienced...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...That's the strange thing I experienced...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたし、何ばかなことを言ってるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What a stupid thing I'm saying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What a stupid thing I'm saying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ごめん、忘れてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sorry, forget it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sorry, forget it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ううん…もしも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's okay... but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's okay... but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もしも、だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの西園さんは、これまで鈴が知ってた西園さんとは別人だって言ったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you were told that she's not the Nishizono-san you used to know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you were told that she's not the Nishizono-san you used to know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は信じる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would you believe it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would you believe it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は期待した。
MESSAGE.EN: I was hoping.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was hoping.

MESSAGE.JP: しかしたら、鈴は真実を思い出してくれるかも知れない、って。
MESSAGE.EN: I was hoping she could possibly remember the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was hoping she could possibly remember the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: も、鈴はちょっと眉をひそめる。
MESSAGE.EN: But a puzzled frown formed on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: But a puzzled frown formed on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…それは信じない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I wouldn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I wouldn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしは覚えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I do remember.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I do remember.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「野球の練習も、この前の試合のことも、みんなでやったこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The practice, the match, everything I did with everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The practice, the match, everything I did with everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「みおと一緒に遊んだことを覚えてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I remember playing with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I remember playing with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そのみおが、みおじゃないとしたら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If Mio weren't Mio...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If Mio weren't Mio...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしは、自分の記憶を疑わなくちゃいけなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I wouldn't be able to trust any of my memories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I wouldn't be able to trust any of my memories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「みおのことだけじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's not just about her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's not just about her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もっと昔…理樹たちとの大切な昔の想い出まで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Even those precious memories of our childhood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Even those precious memories of our childhood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だから、たとえ理樹の言葉でも、それは信じない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So, even if you told me so, I'd refuse to believe it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So, even if you told me so, I'd refuse to believe it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉が辛かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words weighed heavily on my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words weighed heavily on my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: の状態に違和感を持っているのは、僕だけなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Did nobody else feel what I was feeling?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did nobody else feel what I was feeling?

MESSAGE.JP: んなが間違っていて、僕だけが正しいのだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If they were all wrong and only I was correct,
MESSAGE.Translation: If they were all wrong and only I was correct,

MESSAGE.JP: れはつまり、みんなが正しくて、僕だけが間違っているのと同じことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: wouldn't that be exactly equivalent to them all being correct and only I was wrong?
MESSAGE.Translation: wouldn't that be exactly equivalent to them all being correct and only I was wrong?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしたちは子供の頃から一緒だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We've been together ever since we were little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We've been together ever since we were little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしと恭介、真人と謙吾、そして理樹の５人はずっと同じ時間を過ごしてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Me, Kyousuke, Masato, Kengo and you, the five of us have spent a lot of time together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Me, Kyousuke, Masato, Kengo and you, the five of us have spent a lot of time together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも…いつのまにか、違ってしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But... recently that has changed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But... recently that has changed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の口ぶりが悲しく聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't mistake the sadness in her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't mistake the sadness in her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: が名前を呼ぶと、鈴は首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head as I called her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head as I called her name.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「勘違いするな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't get the wrong idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't get the wrong idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それはきっと悪いことじゃない。理樹にとっても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't think it's a bad thing for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't think it's a bad thing for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…たぶん、あたしにとっても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...or probably for me, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...or probably for me, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしが…理樹のことを一番知ってるって思ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I thought I understood you better than anyone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I thought I understood you better than anyone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも…もうそうじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But... not anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But... not anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「みおは、あたしの知らない理樹を知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Mio, she knows things about you I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Mio, she knows things about you I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹は、あたしが知らないみおを知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And Riki, you know things about her I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And Riki, you know things about her I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹は、理樹の想い出を信じろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You should believe your own memories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You should believe your own memories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹が何に悩んでるのかはわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not sure what's bothering you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not sure what's bothering you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうして今のみおが別人だなんて言うのか、理解できない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And I can't figure out why you believe Mio is someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And I can't figure out why you believe Mio is someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それが…あたしと理樹の距離」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That is... the distance between you and me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That is... the distance between you and me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、お弁当食べよう。理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So, why don't we have lunch, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So, why don't we have lunch, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ、うん。そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, yeah. Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, yeah. Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は随分と久しぶりに、鈴とふたりきりでご飯を食べた。
MESSAGE.EN: For the first time in a long while, Rin and I ate lunch together.
MESSAGE.Translation: For the first time in a long while, Rin and I ate lunch together.

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥は授業が終わると、すぐにどこか行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori left the classroom right after the last class was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori left the classroom right after the last class was over.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子１@「直枝くん、今日は一緒に帰らないんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl 1@❝Naoe-kun, aren't you going back with her today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl 1@❝Naoe-kun, aren't you going back with her today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…誰と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...With who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...With who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子１@「えー、美魚に決まってるじゃんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl 1@❝Ehh, Mio, of course, who else?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl 1@❝Ehh, Mio, of course, who else?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子２@「あはは、けんかでもしたんじゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl 2@❝Ahaha, could it be you two are fighting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl 2@❝Ahaha, could it be you two are fighting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女たちの記憶の中では、どうやら僕と西園さんは毎日、一緒に帰っていたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: According to their memory, it seemed that I always used to leave school together with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: According to their memory, it seemed that I always used to leave school together with her.

MESSAGE.JP: れが彼女たちにとっての、過去なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a past that belonged to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a past that belonged to them.

MESSAGE.JP: は女子寮に足を運んでみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to pay a visit to the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to pay a visit to the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: ドなら、きっと何か知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud had to know something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud had to know something.

MESSAGE.JP: 室を見回してみたけど姿がなかった。もう寮に戻っているかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't find her in the classroom, so I supposed she had already gotten back to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't find her in the classroom, so I supposed she had already gotten back to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: がめだてられることもなく、僕は女子寮に入ることができた。
MESSAGE.EN: I succeeded in getting into the building without any trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: I succeeded in getting into the building without any trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: ドと西園さんの部屋のドアをノックする。
MESSAGE.EN: I knocked on the door of the room Kud and Nishizono-san lived in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knocked on the door of the room Kud and Nishizono-san lived in.

MESSAGE.JP: 度か繰り返してみても、返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite another few additional taps, no one answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite another few additional taps, no one answered.

MESSAGE.JP: だ帰っていないんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Wasn't either of them back yet?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wasn't either of them back yet?

MESSAGE.JP: 待をせずにノブをまわすと、あっけなくドアが開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Against my expectations, the door knob turned when I tried it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Against my expectations, the door knob turned when I tried it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: さく声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I called her in a small voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called her in a small voice.

MESSAGE.JP: える人はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人のいない、それも女の子の部屋の中をじろじろと見るのは抵抗があるけど、この際構っていられない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I felt a little bad about looking around in somebody else's room, and a girl's for that matter, in their absence, I didn't have any time to mind such things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I felt a little bad about looking around in somebody else's room, and a girl's for that matter, in their absence, I didn't have any time to mind such things.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みかけの本が、机の上に伏せられている。ついさっきまで、誰かいたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: On the desk was an overturned, open book; it looked as though somebody had been reading it just a moment earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the desk was an overturned, open book; it looked as though somebody had been reading it just a moment earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: の本の表紙には見覚えがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: I recognized the title of the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recognized the title of the book.

MESSAGE.JP: いタッチで描かれた女の子の絵。あの日のデートで僕が買った本、今朝鞄の中に入っていた本と同じものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A girl drawn with pastel colors. It was the same book as the one I had bought during the date the other day, and it was one of the books I had found in my weekend bag this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: A girl drawn with pastel colors. It was the same book as the one I had bought during the date the other day, and it was one of the books I had found in my weekend bag this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、どうしてここに？
MESSAGE.EN: Why would it be here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why would it be here?

MESSAGE.JP: の本は、間違いなく僕の部屋にある。
MESSAGE.EN: My copy was definitely still in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: My copy was definitely still in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: こにあるのは当然、この部屋に住んでいる人…つまり西園さんのものだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, the one here had to belong to one inhabiting this room... that is, Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, the one here had to belong to one inhabiting this room... that is, Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: っているならば、貸してくれればよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: She could have lent me it if she already had a copy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She could have lent me it if she already had a copy.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことは一言も言わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, she had not said a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, she had not said a word.

MESSAGE.JP: どういうことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Why not?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Why not?

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんはわかっていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was more and more certain now...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was more and more certain now...

MESSAGE.JP: の日、もう自分がここに帰ってこないことが。
MESSAGE.EN: ...that she had already known that she wouldn't set foot in this room ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...that she had already known that she wouldn't set foot in this room ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうこと、だったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have been the truth of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must have been the truth of it.

MESSAGE.JP: はもう一度、部屋を見回す。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around the room one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around the room one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に伏せた本を読んでいるのは、誰だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Who was it reading the book on that desk now?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who was it reading the book on that desk now?

MESSAGE.JP: ド、か。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud?

MESSAGE.JP: れとも、『西園さん』だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Or, ❛Nishizono-san❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or, ❛Nishizono-san❜?

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、この部屋には誰も帰っていないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Could this room have already been abandoned?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Could this room have already been abandoned?

MESSAGE.JP: の日の朝、崩れるほどに積まれていた本の山もない。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't just the residents. I couldn't find any trace of the books I'd seen when I was last here anywhere either.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't just the residents. I couldn't find any trace of the books I'd seen when I was last here anywhere either.

MESSAGE.JP: たクローゼットに押し込まれているんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she had stuffed them all into the closet again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she had stuffed them all into the closet again?

MESSAGE.JP: ち切れんばかりだった扉は、今見るとシンとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: But the closet looked perfectly normal when I looked at it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the closet looked perfectly normal when I looked at it.

MESSAGE.JP: んだところで、中から本が溢れてくる様子はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after a close examination, there didn't appear to be any signs that it was overstuffed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after a close examination, there didn't appear to be any signs that it was overstuffed.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは、あの本の山は最初からなかったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or, those books might never have been in this room from the start.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or, those books might never have been in this room from the start.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰もいないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is nobody really here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is nobody really here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れば分かり切ったことを、もう一度口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked the obvious in order to make certain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked the obvious in order to make certain.

MESSAGE.JP: はり、返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: And, sure enough, nobody answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, sure enough, nobody answered.

MESSAGE.JP: ドに訊けば、何かわかるかも知れないと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I had assumed that Kud might know something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had assumed that Kud might know something.

MESSAGE.JP: お願いだから。
MESSAGE.EN: ...For crying out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...For crying out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: かひとりだけでもいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody, no, anybody.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody, no, anybody.

MESSAGE.JP: の西園さんが『西園さん』じゃない、と言って欲しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Please tell me that girl isn't ❛Nishizono-san.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Please tell me that girl isn't ❛Nishizono-san.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ゃあ、今の西園さんは誰なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But who on earth is the girl that everybody believes is Nishizono-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: But who on earth is the girl that everybody believes is Nishizono-san?

MESSAGE.JP: 結局はそこに戻ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No matter where my thoughts wandered, I eventually came back to that riddle.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No matter where my thoughts wandered, I eventually came back to that riddle.

MESSAGE.JP: の日『西園美鳥』と名乗った西園さんと同じ姿をした少女。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl who resembled Nishizono-san and had introduced herself as 'Midori Nishizono' against the setting sun that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl who resembled Nishizono-san and had introduced herself as 'Midori Nishizono' against the setting sun that day.

MESSAGE.JP: して、今は彼女が『西園美魚』として、僕以外のクラスメイトに認識されている。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl who was now acknowledged as ❛Mio Nishizono❜ by all of her classmates apart from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl who was now acknowledged as ❛Mio Nishizono❜ by all of her classmates apart from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 人や謙吾、そして鈴までもが。
MESSAGE.EN: By Masato, Kengo, and even Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: By Masato, Kengo, and even Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、まぎれもない真実なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was an indisputable truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was an indisputable truth.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく待ってみたけど、誰も戻ってこない。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I waited for another couple of minutes, neither of the tenants showed up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I waited for another couple of minutes, neither of the tenants showed up.

MESSAGE.JP: 子寮に遅くまで残っているわけにも行かず、僕は自分の部屋に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: As I didn't want to stay in the girls' dorm for much longer, I ended up returning to mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I didn't want to stay in the girls' dorm for much longer, I ended up returning to mine.

MESSAGE.JP: は女子寮に足を運んでみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to pay a visit to the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to pay a visit to the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: がめだてられることもなく、僕は女子寮に入ることができた。
MESSAGE.EN: I succeeded in getting into the building without any trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: I succeeded in getting into the building without any trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの部屋のドアをノックする。
MESSAGE.EN: I knocked on the door of Nishizono-san's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knocked on the door of Nishizono-san's room.

MESSAGE.JP: 度か繰り返してみても、返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite another few additional taps, no one answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite another few additional taps, no one answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 待をせずにノブをまわすと、あっけなくドアが開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Against my expectations, the door knob turned when I tried it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Against my expectations, the door knob turned when I tried it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…おじゃまします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm coming in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm coming in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さく声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I called out weakly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called out weakly.

MESSAGE.JP: える人はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人のいない、それも女の子の部屋の中をじろじろと見るのは抵抗があるけど、この際構っていられない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I felt a little bad about looking around in somebody else's room, and a girl's for that matter, in their absence, I didn't have any time to mind such things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I felt a little bad about looking around in somebody else's room, and a girl's for that matter, in their absence, I didn't have any time to mind such things.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みかけの本が、机の上に伏せられている。ついさっきまで、誰かいたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: On the desk was an overturned, open book; it looked as though somebody had been reading it just a moment earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the desk was an overturned, open book; it looked as though somebody had been reading it just a moment earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: の本の表紙には見覚えがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: I recognized the title of the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recognized the title of the book.

MESSAGE.JP: いタッチで描かれた女の子の絵。あの日のデートで僕が買った本、今朝鞄の中に入っていた本と同じものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A girl drawn with pastel colors. It was the same book as the one I had bought during the date the other day, and it was one of the books I had found in my weekend bag this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: A girl drawn with pastel colors. It was the same book as the one I had bought during the date the other day, and it was one of the books I had found in my weekend bag this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、どうしてここに？
MESSAGE.EN: Why would it be here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why would it be here?

MESSAGE.JP: の本は、間違いなく僕の部屋にある。
MESSAGE.EN: My copy was definitely still in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: My copy was definitely still in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: こにあるのは当然、この部屋に住んでいる人…つまり西園さんのものだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, the one here had to belong to one inhabiting this room... that is, Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, the one here had to belong to one inhabiting this room... that is, Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: っているならば、貸してくれればよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: She could have lent me it if she already had a copy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She could have lent me it if she already had a copy.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことは一言も言わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, she had not said a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, she had not said a word.

MESSAGE.JP: どういうことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Why not?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Why not?

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんはわかっていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was more and more certain now...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was more and more certain now...

MESSAGE.JP: の日、もう自分がここに帰ってこないことが。
MESSAGE.EN: ...that she had already known that she wouldn't set foot in this room ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...that she had already known that she wouldn't set foot in this room ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうこと、だったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That must have been the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That must have been the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: はもう一度、部屋を見回す。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around the room one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around the room one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に伏せた本を読んでいるのは、誰だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Who was it reading the book on that desk now?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who was it reading the book on that desk now?

MESSAGE.JP: 誰か』なんて、本当にいるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Did ❛the reader❜ really exist in the first place?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did ❛the reader❜ really exist in the first place?

MESSAGE.JP: の日の朝、崩れるほどに積まれていた本の山もない。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't just the resident. I couldn't find any trace of the books I'd seen when I was last here anywhere either.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't just the resident. I couldn't find any trace of the books I'd seen when I was last here anywhere either.

MESSAGE.JP: たクローゼットに押し込まれているんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she had stuffed them all into the closet again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she had stuffed them all into the closet again?

MESSAGE.JP: ち切れんばかりだった扉は、今見るとシンとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: But the closet looked perfectly normal when I looked at it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the closet looked perfectly normal when I looked at it.

MESSAGE.JP: んだところで、中から本が溢れてくる様子はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after a close examination, there didn't appear to be any signs that it was overstuffed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after a close examination, there didn't appear to be any signs that it was overstuffed.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは、あの本の山は最初からなかったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or, those books might never have been in this room from the start.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or, those books might never have been in this room from the start.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰もいないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is nobody really here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is nobody really here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れば分かり切ったことを、もう一度口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked the obvious in order to make certain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked the obvious in order to make certain.

MESSAGE.JP: はり、返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: And, sure enough, nobody answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, sure enough, nobody answered.

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋に来れば、何かわかるかも知れないと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I had assumed that I would be able to find something out in this room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had assumed that I would be able to find something out in this room.

MESSAGE.JP: 願いだから。
MESSAGE.EN: For crying out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: For crying out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: かひとりだけでもいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody, no, anybody.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody, no, anybody.

MESSAGE.JP: の西園さんが『西園さん』じゃない、と言って欲しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Please tell me that girl isn't ❛Nishizono-san.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Please tell me that girl isn't ❛Nishizono-san.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ゃあ、今の西園さんは誰なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But who on earth is the girl that everybody believes is Nishizono-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: But who on earth is the girl that everybody believes is Nishizono-san?

MESSAGE.JP: 結局はそこに戻ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No matter where my thoughts wandered, I eventually came back to that riddle.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No matter where my thoughts wandered, I eventually came back to that riddle.

MESSAGE.JP: の日『西園美鳥』と名乗った西園さんと同じ姿をした少女。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl who resembled Nishizono-san and had introduced herself as 'Midori Nishizono' against the setting sun that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl who resembled Nishizono-san and had introduced herself as 'Midori Nishizono' against the setting sun that day.

MESSAGE.JP: して、今は彼女が『西園美魚』として、僕以外のクラスメイトに認識されている。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl who was now acknowledged as ❛Mio Nishizono❜ by all of her classmates apart from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl who was now acknowledged as ❛Mio Nishizono❜ by all of her classmates apart from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 人や謙吾、そして鈴までもが。
MESSAGE.EN: By Masato, Kengo, and even Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: By Masato, Kengo, and even Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、まぎれもない真実なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was an undisputable truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was an undisputable truth.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく待ってみたけど、誰も戻ってこない。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I waited for another couple of minutes, the tenant didn't show up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I waited for another couple of minutes, the tenant didn't show up.

MESSAGE.JP: 子寮に遅くまで残っているわけにも行かず、僕は自分の部屋に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: As I didn't want to stay in the girls' dorm for much longer, I ended up returning to mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I didn't want to stay in the girls' dorm for much longer, I ended up returning to mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 室に入った途端、後ろから飛びかかってくる影があった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right at the moment I entered the classroom, somebody pounced upon me from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right at the moment I entered the classroom, somebody pounced upon me from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: を覆われて、視界が遮られる。
MESSAGE.EN: Hands reached out to cover my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hands reached out to cover my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「だーれだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Guess who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Guess who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当たってる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I could feel certain body parts pressed against my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I could feel certain body parts pressed against my back.

MESSAGE.JP: かに、だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: The pressure was... rather subtle.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pressure was... rather subtle.

MESSAGE.JP: らかさが、あった。
MESSAGE.EN: But there was a particular softness.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there was a particular softness.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-Hey...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-Hey...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「あはは、なに慌ててるのかなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Ahaha, why so flustered?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Ahaha, why so flustered?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「もしかして、感じてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Could it be, you can feel it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Could it be, you can feel it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「理樹君ってば、純情」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝How very pure of you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝How very pure of you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「と、とにかく。離れてよ、美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A-Anyway, get off of me, Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A-Anyway, get off of me, Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あはっ、正解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Aha, bingo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Aha, bingo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うやく、美鳥が手を離してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She finally let me go.
MESSAGE.Translation: She finally let me go.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「せっかくの朝の挨拶なのに、ひどいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's so mean of you. It was just a cute morning greeting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's so mean of you. It was just a cute morning greeting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「改めて、おはようだね。理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Let me start over. Morning, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Let me start over. Morning, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はよう、と僕はようやくそれだけを言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I gathered myself to return her greeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gathered myself to return her greeting.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「元気ないねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You look down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You look down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ひょっとして、誰か大切な人がいなくなっちゃったのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Maybe your precious someone's gone somewhere?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Maybe your precious someone's gone somewhere?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「なんてねー、あはははは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Just kidding, ahahahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Just kidding, ahahahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が何を言おうとする前に、美鳥は他の女子の方へと歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could reply, she danced away and walked up to the other girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could reply, she danced away and walked up to the other girls.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よう、朝から仲がいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, you guys are doing well first thing in the morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, you guys are doing well first thing in the morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなんじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、もめてんのか？　仲良くしろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You guys still at it? Make up, all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You guys still at it? Make up, all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I told you that's not it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I told you that's not it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「わかった、わかった。そういうことにしといてやるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, all right, let's leave it at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, all right, let's leave it at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヤキの木の下に西園さんの姿はない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san could not be found under the zelkova tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san could not be found under the zelkova tree.

MESSAGE.JP: 日もリトルバスターズの練習はない。
MESSAGE.EN: We didn't have practice today.
MESSAGE.Translation: We didn't have practice today.

MESSAGE.JP: ラウンドから響く声は、知らない誰かのものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, those animated cries coming from the school grounds were being produced by some other sports clubs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, those animated cries coming from the school grounds were being produced by some other sports clubs.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんはいつもここに座って、ひとりで本を読んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san always read a book all alone, sitting right here beneath the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san always read a book all alone, sitting right here beneath the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんが座っていた場所に腰掛けてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I seated myself at the same spot at which she'd always stayed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seated myself at the same spot at which she'd always stayed.

MESSAGE.JP: 漏れ日が視界の端に揺れる。
MESSAGE.EN: From the corner of my eye, I saw the sunbeams dance between the swaying leaves.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the corner of my eye, I saw the sunbeams dance between the swaying leaves.

MESSAGE.JP: ―こんなに静かだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I hadn't known this was such a tranquil place.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I hadn't known this was such a tranquil place.

MESSAGE.JP: ラウンドのかけ声は、やけに遠くに聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: Those shouts of encouragement sounded to be coming from far, far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those shouts of encouragement sounded to be coming from far, far away.

MESSAGE.JP: 校の中にありながら、まるで違う場所のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This place was part of the school, yet it felt like a different realm altogether.
MESSAGE.Translation: This place was part of the school, yet it felt like a different realm altogether.

MESSAGE.JP: かにここは本を読むのにうってつけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For sure this was far and away the best place to be enjoying a book.
MESSAGE.Translation: For sure this was far and away the best place to be enjoying a book.

MESSAGE.JP: うすぐ、梅雨が来る。
MESSAGE.EN: The rainy season was almost upon us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rainy season was almost upon us.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、西園さんはここで本を読むと言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless, Nishizono-san had told me she was going to come out here and read books even when it started,
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless, Nishizono-san had told me she was going to come out here and read books even when it started,

MESSAGE.JP: 合羽をまとってまで。
MESSAGE.EN: even if it meant wearing a raincoat.
MESSAGE.Translation: even if it meant wearing a raincoat.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、僕が西園さんを連れ出した。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I'd taken her out from this small, shadowy yard
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I'd taken her out from this small, shadowy yard

MESSAGE.JP: の陰から、グラウンドの太陽の下に。
MESSAGE.EN: to the baseball field filled with sunlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: to the baseball field filled with sunlight.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、本当に彼女の望んだことだったんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered whether that was something she had genuinely wanted to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered whether that was something she had genuinely wanted to do.

MESSAGE.JP: とりきりで本を読んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Sitting here alone reading books.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sitting here alone reading books.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけで本当は西園さんは幸せだったんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if that alone hadn't been her definition of happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if that alone hadn't been her definition of happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: から…戻っていってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: And that's why... she had decided to return.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that's why... she had decided to return.

MESSAGE.JP: 分が楽しかった日々に…。
MESSAGE.EN: To those pleasant days.
MESSAGE.Translation: To those pleasant days.

MESSAGE.JP: を置いて。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving me behind...
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving me behind...

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「なに、暗い顔してんのよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝What's going on? You look so gloomy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝What's going on? You look so gloomy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然、頭上から声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: A sudden voice from overhead asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sudden voice from overhead asked.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Here I come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Here I come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: け声ひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: The owner of the voice called out,
MESSAGE.Translation: The owner of the voice called out,

MESSAGE.JP: から地面へと、人が降り立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: and dropped off of a tree branch.
MESSAGE.Translation: and dropped off of a tree branch.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「うーん、できれば美魚って呼んでほしいんだけどなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hmm, I'd prefer you called me Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hmm, I'd prefer you called me Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥が、にぃっと笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a big grin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a big grin.

MESSAGE.JP: の笑顔は西園さんに似ていない。
MESSAGE.EN: But the smile was far from one Nishizono-san would make.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the smile was far from one Nishizono-san would make.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「理樹君はまだ、美魚のことを覚えているんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You seem to remember Mio even now, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You seem to remember Mio even now, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「他のみんなは、あたしのことを美魚って呼ぶのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Even though everyone else calls me Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Even though everyone else calls me Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「理樹君だけは、あたしと美魚の区別が付くんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You alone can still tell me apart from her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You alone can still tell me apart from her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ひょっとして、愛のなせる業なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Could it be the power of love that makes it possible for you to do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Could it be the power of love that makes it possible for you to do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「…ちょっと、妬けちゃうなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...I'm a little bit jealous of her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...I'm a little bit jealous of her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口を叩く彼女にいらだちを覚える。
MESSAGE.EN: Her tone was so light it got on my nerves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her tone was so light it got on my nerves.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いったい西園さんに何をしたんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What in the world did you do to her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What in the world did you do to her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 日からの異変の中、美鳥とふたりでゆっくり話をするのはこれが初めてだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the first time I got a chance to confront her alone ever since the unusual occurrences started yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the first time I got a chance to confront her alone ever since the unusual occurrences started yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ぬぬ、それは随分な言い草だと思うなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Tsk-tsk～, I think that's a terrible question to ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Tsk-tsk～, I think that's a terrible question to ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ねた顔をみせる。
MESSAGE.EN: She pouted.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pouted.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんが見せたことのない表情ばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet again her face had an expression which Nishizono-san wouldn't make.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet again her face had an expression which Nishizono-san wouldn't make.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あのさ。西園さん、だと紛らわしいと思わない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You know what. It's very confusing that you call her Nishizono-san, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You know what. It's very confusing that you call her Nishizono-san, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あたしも美魚もどっちも西園さん、なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝My last name's Nishizono, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝My last name's Nishizono, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あたしのことは、美魚でお願いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Call me Mio, all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Call me Mio, all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「じゃないと、他の人に訊かれたら困っちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Otherwise, you'll get in trouble if other people hear us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Otherwise, you'll get in trouble if other people hear us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「みんな、あたしのことを『美魚』って呼んでるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Everybody calls me ❛Mio.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Everybody calls me ❛Mio.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それは、できない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I can't do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I can't do that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Well, I can understand why you don't want to, so I give up for now.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's the point you must keep in mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…西園さんが、何を望むって言うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What was it she wished for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What was it she wished for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「この状況を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This situation?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you saying Nishizono-san wanted this whole bizarre affair to happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you saying Nishizono-san wanted this whole bizarre affair to happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「分からないよ。…何も分からない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't understand... I just don't understand anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't understand... I just don't understand anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「うんうん、そうだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Yep, yep, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Yep, yep, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「人生なんて、しょせん分かんないことだらけだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No matter how we run our lives, they're always full of what we don't understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No matter how we run our lives, they're always full of what we don't understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「それでもみんな生きてるんだからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Even so, we all live on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Even so, we all live on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うるさいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sh-shut up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sh-shut up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥の言葉はどこまで本気か分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell how serious she was being.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell how serious she was being.

MESSAGE.JP: れが余計に僕をいらだたせる。
MESSAGE.EN: And that fact irritated me even more.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that fact irritated me even more.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんはどこにいるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where's Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where's Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「それを知って、どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Let's say I tell you that, what will you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Let's say I tell you that, what will you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もちろん、連れ戻す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bring her back, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bring her back, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝What for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝What for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしてって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What for...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What for...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「『西園美魚』なら、ここにいるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝❛Mio Nishizono❜ is right before you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝❛Mio Nishizono❜ is right before you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「クラスの誰もが、あたしのことを『西園美魚』だって思ってる」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝All the classmates think of me as ❛Mio Nishizono,❜ save you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「おかしいって思ってるのは、理樹君ひとりだけだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You're the only one who thinks I'm weird in any way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You're the only one who thinks I'm weird in any way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「だったら、本当はどっちがおかしいのか分かるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Then, it's obvious which one of us is actually the weird one, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Then, it's obvious which one of us is actually the weird one, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねえ…教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey... tell me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey... tell me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…君は何者なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Who are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Who are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「…やっと、それを訊いてくれるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...I've been waiting for you to ask that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...I've been waiting for you to ask that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の声を聞いた美鳥が、静かに微笑む。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a quiet smile in response to my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a quiet smile in response to my question.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どういうこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いが削がれた。

MESSAGE.Translation: I was losing my impetus.

MESSAGE.JP: って、そんな顔されてしまったら。
MESSAGE.EN: Because on her face was a look...
MESSAGE.Translation: Because on her face was a look...

MESSAGE.JP: るで――西園さんみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...which would not have been out of place... on Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...which would not have been out of place... on Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「自分が果たして、誰なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Who you really are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Who you really are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「人類永遠の命題と言ってもいい疑問だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You could say that's one of the most fundamental questions the human race has sought after for eternity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You could say that's one of the most fundamental questions the human race has sought after for eternity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「英語で言うと、アイデンティティってやつかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Or putting it another way, what is one's identity?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Or putting it another way, what is one's identity?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「日本語にすれば、自我の認識」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Or one's self-awareness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Or one's self-awareness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「うんうん、とても良い質問だと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Yep, yep, that's an excellent question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Yep, yep, that's an excellent question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「理樹君ってば、哲学者ぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You're such a philosopher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You're such a philosopher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことを訊いてるんじゃないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what I'm asking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what I'm asking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「…じゃあ逆に訊くけれど。理樹君は、どう思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...Then let me approach this from another angle. What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...Then let me approach this from another angle. What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「この『あたし』は誰だと思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Who do you think ❛I❜ am?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Who do you think ❛I❜ am?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…西園さんの姉妹…かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san's... sister?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san's... sister?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「でも、信じてないでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But even if I told you that was the case, you wouldn't believe it, would you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But even if I told you that was the case, you wouldn't believe it, would you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の通りだ。それが一番無難な答え。
MESSAGE.EN: She's right, I wouldn't. While I believed it the most logical answer,
MESSAGE.Translation: She's right, I wouldn't. While I believed it the most logical answer,

MESSAGE.JP: けど、そうじゃないと心では理解している。
MESSAGE.EN: I understood in my heart that that wasn't the case.
MESSAGE.Translation: I understood in my heart that that wasn't the case.

MESSAGE.JP: が考えているのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: The actual suspicion in my mind...
MESSAGE.Translation: The actual suspicion in my mind...

MESSAGE.JP: っと突拍子もない答えで。
MESSAGE.EN: was a lot more outrageous,
MESSAGE.Translation: was a lot more outrageous,

MESSAGE.JP: して、それは多分当たっているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: and, in all likelihood, the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: and, in all likelihood, the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「じゃあ、朝と同じ質問をもう一度するね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'll repeat the question I asked this morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'll repeat the question I asked this morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「さて、あたしはだーれだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝So, guess who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝So, guess who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: くまで、笑顔で美鳥は問う。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile wouldn't leave her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile wouldn't leave her face.

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕には笑顔は作れない。
MESSAGE.EN: I, however, could not reproduce it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I, however, could not reproduce it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「君は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are...❞

MESSAGE.EN: I vividly remembered the shape of Nishizono-san's shadow I'd witnessed under that evening sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I vividly remembered the shape of Nishizono-san's shadow I'd witnessed under that evening sun.

MESSAGE.JP: の時、西園さん自身の影、はなく。
MESSAGE.EN: She herself hadn't cast any shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She herself hadn't cast any shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 面にあるのは、彼女のまとう服のものだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Only the outline of her clothes was drawn on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only the outline of her clothes was drawn on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんがなくした…影なんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are the shadow... that Nishizono-san has lost, aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are the shadow... that Nishizono-san has lost, aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は美鳥の足下に目を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked down at Midori's feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked down at Midori's feet.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、はっきりとわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was very obvious.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was very obvious.

MESSAGE.JP: 女にも『影』はない。よく見れば、彼女の足下にあるのは制服が作る影だけ。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't cast a shadow either. Looking at it closely, the darkness beneath her was the shadow of her school uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't cast a shadow either. Looking at it closely, the darkness beneath her was the shadow of her school uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: れもまた、あの日に見たままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That fact hadn't changed either since that day when we had met at the shore.
MESSAGE.Translation: That fact hadn't changed either since that day when we had met at the shore.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ぴんぽーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Bingo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Bingo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「…でも。満点じゃないけどね。うーん、八十点くらいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...But that's not entirely right. Hmm, 80 percent at most.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...But that's not entirely right. Hmm, 80 percent at most.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「待ってても正解は教えてあげないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Even if you keep waiting, I won't tell you the answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Even if you keep waiting, I won't tell you the answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あたしは、そんなに親切じゃないからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I am not that kind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I am not that kind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんが日傘を手放さなかった理由も、今となってはわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: With the benefit of hindsight, there was no question about why Nishizono-san had always carried her parasol everywhere with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the benefit of hindsight, there was no question about why Nishizono-san had always carried her parasol everywhere with her.

MESSAGE.JP: がない自分を見られたくなかったんだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: Midori, on the other hand, didn't care to hide it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥に影がないことを知っている僕は、気になってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Knowing the secret, I couldn't help but be concerned about her shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Knowing the secret, I couldn't help but be concerned about her shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…誰も影がないことに気づかないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Hasn't anybody else noticed you have no shadow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Hasn't anybody else noticed you have no shadow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「うん、誰も何も言わないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No, not one of them has mentioned it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No, not one of them has mentioned it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: には美鳥の影の不自然さがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: The strangeness of her shadow was evident to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The strangeness of her shadow was evident to me.

MESSAGE.JP: も、他の人には見えないのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But why could nobody else see it?
MESSAGE.Translation: But why could nobody else see it?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ここでも、おかしいのは僕の方なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Am I really the strange one here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Am I really the strange one here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「そんなことないよ。よーく見れば、気づく人もいるかもね」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's not it at all. Someone might notice if they were paying attention.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But hey, who cares about somebody else's shadow?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Everyone has a shadow. Why would anyone look?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Everyone has a shadow. Why would anyone look?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Clothes and socks cover almost my entire body anyway, save for the head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Clothes and socks cover almost my entire body anyway, save for the head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あー、でも。服脱いだら、さすがに分かっちゃうだろうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ah, but I'm sure if I were to take it all off, I wouldn't be able to hide it anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ah, but I'm sure if I were to take it all off, I wouldn't be able to hide it anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「裸だと、影出ないから。…確かめてみる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Want to see if it's true? ...Just say the word and I'll undress.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Want to see if it's true? ...Just say the word and I'll undress.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ、いや、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, um, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, um, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あははは、理樹君ってば可愛いなあ、もう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahahaha, you're so cute, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahahaha, you're so cute, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝So, whose naked body did you just imagine?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝So, whose naked body did you just imagine?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あたし？　それとも、美魚？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Mine? Or Mio's?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Mine? Or Mio's?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「か、考えてなんかないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I didn't imagine anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I didn't imagine anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ふーん、ほんとに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Really? Are you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Really? Are you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなこと言われたら、考えてしまうじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: When she asked it like that...
MESSAGE.Translation: When she asked it like that...

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの、裸。

MESSAGE.Translation: ...how could I not visualize Nishizono-san naked?

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You lech.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You lech.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あはは、かわいいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, you're just so cute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, you're just so cute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: としきり笑ってから、不意に真面目な声を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: After a long laugh, she continued in an unexpectedly serious voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a long laugh, she continued in an unexpectedly serious voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「だいたい、美魚は気にしすぎたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You know what, Mio was way too much of a worrywart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You know what, Mio was way too much of a worrywart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「『他人』なんて、自分のことをいちいち見てないのにさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝The ❛other people❜ are too busy with themselves to pay attention to such details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝The ❛other people❜ are too busy with themselves to pay attention to such details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「いっつも日傘をさして、自分の秘密を知られないようにおどおどして。バッカみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Yet, at all times, she was cowering under her parasol, afraid that they'd find out the secret. How ridiculous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Yet, at all times, she was cowering under her parasol, afraid that they'd find out the secret. How ridiculous.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝And in the end, nobody even remembers her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝And in the end, nobody even remembers her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ほんっと、しょうがないよね」
