MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishi... Midori?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishi... Midori?❞

MESSAGE.JP: り返る先には、美鳥が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Turning around, I found Midori standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Turning around, I found Midori standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「うーん、惜しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Aww, so close.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Aww, so close.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「今、西園さんって言いかけたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You were just about to call me Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You were just about to call me Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「…でも、やっぱりあたしとしては美魚って呼んで欲しいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...But I still want you to call me Mio, like I said before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...But I still want you to call me Mio, like I said before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「悩むところだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝So I'm not quite sure if I should be happy about that or not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝So I'm not quite sure if I should be happy about that or not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何の用さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you want...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you want...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ぬぬ、何の用とはご挨拶な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Tsk-tsk, that's such a horrible way of greeting someone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Tsk-tsk, that's such a horrible way of greeting someone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「電話をかけてきたのは、理樹君じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You're the one that just called me on the phone, aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You're the one that just called me on the phone, aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が期待したのは、君じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...You are not the one I was expecting to answer me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...You are not the one I was expecting to answer me.

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉を飲み込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I swallowed back the words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I swallowed back the words.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どうして西園さんの携帯を美鳥が持ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why do you have her phone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why do you have her phone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「だって、これ美魚のだもの。そして、あたしは西園美魚」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Because this is Mio's, and I am Mio Nishizono.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Because this is Mio's, and I am Mio Nishizono.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「どっか、おかしいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Anything wrong with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Anything wrong with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: かしい、と言いたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to tell her there was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to tell her there was.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんと、美鳥。ふたりは別人だと、僕は知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I knew Midori was a completely different person from Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I knew Midori was a completely different person from Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: だけが知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something only I knew.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something only I knew.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「でも、みんなはあたしを美魚って呼ぶよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But everybody calls me Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But everybody calls me Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の思考に割り込むようなタイミングだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She countered as if having read my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: She countered as if having read my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なんで、こんなことになってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why is this happening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why is this happening?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は何度目になるだろうか、そう呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out the question I'd asked over and over again so far.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out the question I'd asked over and over again so far.

MESSAGE.JP: えは期待していなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And, like the other times, I didn't have any expectations for the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, like the other times, I didn't have any expectations for the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「それは勿論、そう望む人がいるからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Of course that's because someone's wishing it to be so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Of course that's because someone's wishing it to be so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も美鳥は少し哀しい顔をして、そう答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face looked somewhat sorrowful as she answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face looked somewhat sorrowful as she answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰かが望んだって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Someone's wishing for it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Someone's wishing for it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それは美鳥だろ。他人事みたいに言わないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That someone is you, right? Don't try to make it sound like somebody else's problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That someone is you, right? Don't try to make it sound like somebody else's problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「………ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝.........Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝.........Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「そんな考えじゃ、いつまで経っても正解にはたどり着けないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You really will never reach the truth unless you can change that point of view.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You really will never reach the truth unless you can change that point of view.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「たどり着けなきゃ、理樹くんはすぐにでも美魚のことを忘れちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝If you can't, you'll lose all the memories of Mio soon enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝If you can't, you'll lose all the memories of Mio soon enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「…あたしとしては、そっちの方が良いんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...Well, that's what I'd prefer to happen in any case.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...Well, that's what I'd prefer to happen in any case.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しの間があってから、美鳥が口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: After a brief, wordless pause, she opened her mouth yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a brief, wordless pause, she opened her mouth yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ねえ、理樹君は先週の月曜日の夕飯、何食べた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Say, what did you have for dinner last Monday?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Say, what did you have for dinner last Monday?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで、いきなりそんなことを訊くの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you asking that for all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you asking that for all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「いいから、教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Just entertain me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Just entertain me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥の考えていることは分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't see the point of her question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't see the point of her question.

MESSAGE.JP: だ…もしかしたら、何かを僕に伝えようとしているのかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I assumed... she was trying to convey something to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I assumed... she was trying to convey something to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 週間前の夕食…なんだったかな。
MESSAGE.EN: For dinner last Monday... what was it?
MESSAGE.Translation: For dinner last Monday... what was it?

MESSAGE.JP: 抵は寮の食堂で決まったものが出てくるからなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: My dinner almost every day was what the cafeteria provided...
MESSAGE.Translation: My dinner almost every day was what the cafeteria provided...

MESSAGE.JP: ーメン？　$K29餃子$K0セット？　それとも、鳥のから揚げだったかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Ramen? $K29Gyoza$K0 combo? Or fried chicken?
MESSAGE.Translation: Ramen? $K29Gyoza$K0 combo? Or fried chicken?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「たった一週間前のことなのに、思い出せないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Can't recall? It's only a week ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Can't recall? It's only a week ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだ、カレーライスだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've got it. It was curry rice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've got it. It was curry rice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふくろの味、と評判の定番メニュー。
MESSAGE.EN: It sure was a popular dish.
MESSAGE.Translation: It sure was a popular dish.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ほんとに、それでいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Are you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Are you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ぶー、はずれです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「答えは、肉ジャガでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝The answer is niku-jaga.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝The answer is niku-jaga.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ジャガ。
MESSAGE.EN: Niku-jaga.
MESSAGE.Translation: Niku-jaga.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうだったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「そうだよ。さっき食堂で聞いてきたんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's right. I went and asked one of the cafeteria staff just now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's right. I went and asked one of the cafeteria staff just now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうか、カレーは次の日だったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ah, I guess curry was the day after.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ah, I guess curry was the day after.❞

MESSAGE.JP: われてみれば、肉ジャガだった気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I was starting to feel like she might be right.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was starting to feel like she might be right.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、そうだ。真人が肉バナとか馬鹿な組み合わせを思いついたりしてたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, I could clearly recall Masato coming up with a stupid combination dish, niku-bana, at that time.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, I could clearly recall Masato coming up with a stupid combination dish, niku-bana, at that time.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ね、ほんの一週間前のことでもなかなか覚えてないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝See? You don't even remember things from only a week ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝See? You don't even remember things from only a week ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「じゃあねえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Okay, next one is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Okay, next one is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「美魚の顔は、覚えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Do you remember Mio's face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Do you remember Mio's face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 戯な笑みを浮かべながら、ふたたび問う。
MESSAGE.EN: She threw another question at me with an impish grin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She threw another question at me with an impish grin.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「当たり前じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐに思い浮かべることができる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could conjure up an image of it without effort.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could conjure up an image of it without effort.

MESSAGE.JP: の前にいる少女と似ていて、でも異なる少女の顔を。
MESSAGE.EN: The face of the girl very much like, yet completely different from this girl in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The face of the girl very much like, yet completely different from this girl in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「でも、細かいところまでは覚えてないんじゃないかなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But I bet you can't bring up the details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But I bet you can't bring up the details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そんなことはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yes, I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yes, I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「顔は覚えてたとしても、どんな服を着てたとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Putting her face aside, what about what she was wearing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Putting her face aside, what about what she was wearing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「そうだなあ、たとえば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Well, for example...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Well, for example...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「じゃあ、美魚はどんな眼鏡をしていたか覚えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Okay, what kind of glasses did she wear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Okay, what kind of glasses did she wear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんが眼鏡だって？
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san wore glasses?
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san wore glasses?

MESSAGE.JP: んなはずはない。
MESSAGE.EN: No way.
MESSAGE.Translation: No way.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんは眼鏡なんてかけてなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She didn't wear glasses.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She didn't wear glasses.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が即答すると、美鳥が驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted an eyebrow in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted an eyebrow in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「えー、覚えてないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ehh, you don't remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ehh, you don't remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「覚えてないも何も、かけてないものはかけてなかったじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not about remembering or not. She never wore glasses.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not about remembering or not. She never wore glasses.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「かけてたよ。確かにあんまり目立たなかったから、覚えてなくてもしょうがないかも知れないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝She did. But I won't blame you for forgetting that, as low-profile as she was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝She did. But I won't blame you for forgetting that, as low-profile as she was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元を歪めて、美鳥が笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a lopsided grin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a lopsided grin.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「そっかあ、覚えてないのかあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I see, so you don't remember.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I see, so you don't remember.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「これじゃ、理樹君があたしのことを美魚って呼ぶのも時間の問題だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝It seems like it'll only be a matter of hours before you start addressing me as Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝It seems like it'll only be a matter of hours before you start addressing me as Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと待ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-wait a minute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-wait a minute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は忘れない、誰が何と言おうと忘れない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I won't forget. No matter what you say, I never will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I won't forget. No matter what you say, I never will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「でも、現に美魚が眼鏡かけてたのを忘れてるじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But, as an actual fact, you already forgot about her glasses.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But, as an actual fact, you already forgot about her glasses.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Odd.
MESSAGE.Translation: Odd.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは眼鏡なんてかけてなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had never seen Nishizono-san with spectacles.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had never seen Nishizono-san with spectacles.

MESSAGE.JP: が思い出す西園さんの姿に、眼鏡をかけているものはない。
MESSAGE.EN: Not one of the images of her popping up in my mind included that kind of accessory.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not one of the images of her popping up in my mind included that kind of accessory.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ほんの一週間前の夕飯だって忘れているのに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Besides, didn't you forget what you ate only a week ago?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Besides, didn't you forget what you ate only a week ago?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を食べたか、美鳥に言われるまで思い出せなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Without Midori, I wouldn't have been able to recollect that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without Midori, I wouldn't have been able to recollect that.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夕飯と西園さんは一緒じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Dinner and Nishizono-san aren't the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Dinner and Nishizono-san aren't the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「一緒だよ。理樹君の中じゃあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝They are. At least to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝They are. At least to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「どうせ忘れちゃうんだったら、同じでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You'll end up forgetting both, so they are both equal, aren't they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You'll end up forgetting both, so they are both equal, aren't they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「理樹君の過去、って意味じゃあ同じだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝They are both parts of your past.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝They are both parts of your past.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違わないっ。夕飯なんて忘れてしまったって何の関係もないことだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who cares about what they ate for dinner a week ago?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who cares about what they ate for dinner a week ago?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんは違うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't compare that with Nishizono-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't compare that with Nishizono-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の誰かにとっては、西園さんも一週間前の夕飯も同じ意味しかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if for everyone else there were no difference between Nishizono-san and a week-old dinner menu...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if for everyone else there were no difference between Nishizono-san and a week-old dinner menu...

MESSAGE.EN: For me――
MESSAGE.Translation: For me――

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「理樹君は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんのことが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Still...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Still...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「美魚のことが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Still?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Still?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Love her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Love her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「一度、振られたのに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Even though she dumped you once?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Even though she dumped you once?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの時は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I didn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I didn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の海では、僕は想いを口にしていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't confess my true feelings to her back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't confess my true feelings to her back then.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃんと伝えなきゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: So I'm going to have to tell them to her in person.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I'm going to have to tell them to her in person.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、何も始まっていないのに。終わるわけにはいかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't have any reason to give up on what I haven't even started yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't have any reason to give up on what I haven't even started yet.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は西園さんを見つけ出す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm finding her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm finding her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう、絶対に忘れない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not forgetting her ever again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not forgetting her ever again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「見つけて、その時には…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And when I meet her again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And when I meet her again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「自分の想いを伝えたい、って言うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You're going to tell her your feelings?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You're going to tell her your feelings?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に、僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded strongly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded strongly.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「そう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う気づくと、なぜか無性に恭介の顔が見たくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I had become aware of that fear, for whatever reason I suddenly became desperate to see his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I had become aware of that fear, for whatever reason I suddenly became desperate to see his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…いつになく真剣な顔をしてるな…深刻な話か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...You look depressed... A serious topic?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...You look depressed... A serious topic?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ちょっとね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, more or less...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, more or less...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介なら、なんとかしてくれるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had faith he could help me out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had faith he could help me out.

MESSAGE.JP: れまでだって、そうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like so many times before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like so many times before.

MESSAGE.JP: とりぼっちだった僕の手を取ってくれた恭介なら、きっと。
MESSAGE.EN: Because he was the one who had held out his hand and taken hold of mine when I had been all alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because he was the one who had held out his hand and taken hold of mine when I had been all alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 年の違う恭介は、まだ美鳥に会っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: Due to being a third year, he wouldn't have gotten to see Midori yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Due to being a third year, he wouldn't have gotten to see Midori yet.

MESSAGE.JP: を見ないうちに美鳥のことを教えれば、きっと西園さんとの違いに気づくはず。
MESSAGE.EN: If I told him about her before they met, he ought to be able to reach the truth of her being a different person from Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I told him about her before they met, he ought to be able to reach the truth of her being a different person from Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 後の希望だった。
MESSAGE.EN: He was my last vestige of hope.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was my last vestige of hope.

MESSAGE.JP: はすべてを話すことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I explained everything to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I explained everything to him.

MESSAGE.JP: の話を黙って聞いていた恭介はひとつ頷いたきり、黙ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: After listening to my story, he gave one nod and said nothing for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: After listening to my story, he gave one nod and said nothing for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「お願いだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm begging you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm begging you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「明日はみんなで野球をやろう。それで…恭介にも美鳥に会ってほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We must have a practice session tomorrow... and you have to meet Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We must have a practice session tomorrow... and you have to meet Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: い沈黙のあと、恭介が重い口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke opened his mouth, his long silence finally broken.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke opened his mouth, his long silence finally broken.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「悪いが、俺には信じられない話だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry, but that's hard for me to swallow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry, but that's hard for me to swallow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺の記憶の中にある西園は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All I remember about Nishizono is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All I remember about Nishizono is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の間を我慢することが、僕にはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't bear to hear the words that would follow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't bear to hear the words that would follow.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介ってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「すまない…思い出せないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry... but I can't remember.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry... but I can't remember.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「西園のことは、もちろん覚えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course I remember about Nishizono.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course I remember about Nishizono.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「リトルバスターズのメンバーとして、一緒に色々やったことは鮮明に覚えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We've done a lot of things with her and the other Little Busters members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We've done a lot of things with her and the other Little Busters members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ただ、それは『そうだった』という大まかな事実だけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But all I have is that kind of rough fact.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But all I have is that kind of rough fact.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「具体的に何をしたか、思い出すことができない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I can't tell specifically what it is we did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I can't tell specifically what it is we did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ここで西園に会えば、きっと他のやつと同じことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm pretty sure even if I did meet Nishizono at this point, there wouldn't be any difference between me and the rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm pretty sure even if I did meet Nishizono at this point, there wouldn't be any difference between me and the rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その時点で俺の記憶は過去にさかのぼって作られるだろう…俺自身が、そうと気づかないままに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝At the moment I see her, my memory will be rewritten... without me ever noticing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝At the moment I see her, my memory will be rewritten... without me ever noticing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「すまないが、俺はおまえの役には立てそうもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, but I don't think I can be of any help to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, but I don't think I can be of any help to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介がそう言う以上、仕方ない。
MESSAGE.EN: If he said so, there was nothing I could do.
MESSAGE.Translation: If he said so, there was nothing I could do.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、せめてもう一度みんなで野球をやろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then why don't we at least play baseball again with everyone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then why don't we at least play baseball again with everyone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: トルバスターズがふたたび一堂に会せば。
MESSAGE.EN: If the whole Little Busters got all together one more time,
MESSAGE.Translation: If the whole Little Busters got all together one more time,

MESSAGE.JP: にか奇跡が起こるんじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: just maybe some miracle would arise out of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: just maybe some miracle would arise out of it.

MESSAGE.JP: んな空想に、僕は頼りたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but resort even to such a dreamlike idea now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but resort even to such a dreamlike idea now.

MESSAGE.JP: も、恭介はゆるゆると首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: He calmly shook his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: He calmly shook his head.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうせ梅雨に入るし、しばらく活動中止だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The rainy season's almost upon us, so no activity for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The rainy season's almost upon us, so no activity for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「各自で練習をおこたらないこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But don't neglect self-practice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But don't neglect self-practice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹から、みんなに伝えておいてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Can you pass that along to the other teammates?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Can you pass that along to the other teammates?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは恭介らしくない言葉だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was not what I expected Kyousuke to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was not what I expected Kyousuke to say.

MESSAGE.JP: だ梅雨入りまでに時間はある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was still plenty of time until the rainy season.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was still plenty of time until the rainy season.

MESSAGE.JP: 合を終えて、恭介の情熱はもう失せてしまったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Had he lost his zeal for baseball with the match now behind us?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had he lost his zeal for baseball with the match now behind us?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 局、なにも得ることのできないままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, I had gained nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, I had gained nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、帰るね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll be off, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll be off, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「待て、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hold on, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hold on, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ち去ろうとした僕を呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: He called out to me as I was about to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: He called out to me as I was about to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お前に次のミッションを与える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I have the next mission for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I have the next mission for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介が僕の目をじっと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: He gazed intently into my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: He gazed intently into my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ミッション…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The next mission...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The next mission...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだ、重要なミッションだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's right. A critical one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's right. A critical one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かしい響きだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That brought back memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: That brought back memories.

MESSAGE.JP: たちの大切なことはいつも、恭介のこの言葉から始まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything important to us always started with those words of his.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything important to us always started with those words of his.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「信じるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do not believe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do not believe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 味がつかめなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't understand what he meant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't understand what he meant.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺の言葉を、おまえは信じるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You must not believe in my words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You must not believe in my words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は噛みしめるように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: He spoke that sentiment firmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He spoke that sentiment firmly.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹。おまえは、おまえを信じろ。俺たちの言葉に頼るな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you believe in yourself. Don't rely on what anyone else says to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you believe in yourself. Don't rely on what anyone else says to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺にはおまえの話が信じられない…。鈴や真人たちでもそうだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I can't believe what you told me... And I'm sure it'd be no different with Rin or Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I can't believe what you told me... And I'm sure it'd be no different with Rin or Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「でも、おまえは信じるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But you must believe in yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But you must believe in yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえの知る、西園のためにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝For the sake of the Nishizono you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝For the sake of the Nishizono you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介。それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, does that mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, does that mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 別、とも取れる言葉だった。
MESSAGE.EN: His demand had the ring of parting words.
MESSAGE.Translation: His demand had the ring of parting words.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺が言えるのは、それだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's all the advice I can give you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's all the advice I can give you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まるで、すべてを知っていて。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything he said made me think that he knew everything...
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything he said made me think that he knew everything...

MESSAGE.JP: の上で僕を突き放しているんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And for that reason was pushing me away on purpose.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And for that reason was pushing me away on purpose.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ひとりで頑張るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'll deal with this by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'll deal with this by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... It's up to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... It's up to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後に短く言葉を交わして、僕は自室に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: After that dialogue, I got back to our room.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that dialogue, I got back to our room.

MESSAGE.JP: 鳥は哀しからずや空の青
MESSAGE.EN: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?

MESSAGE.EN: I kept repeating the two poems as if chanting a magic spell.

MESSAGE.EN: I tried to imprint them in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: が覚めて。

MESSAGE.JP: 飯を食べながら。
MESSAGE.EN: During breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: During breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: 室で。
MESSAGE.EN: In the classroom.

MESSAGE.EN: In the courtyard.

MESSAGE.EN: I won't forget.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't forget.

MESSAGE.JP: の歌を好きだと言った人のことを。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't forget the girl who told me she loved those pieces.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't forget the girl who told me she loved those pieces.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「理樹君、なに恐い顔してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Riki-kun, why are you making such a scary face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Riki-kun, why are you making such a scary face?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hey, are you listening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hey, are you listening?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ぬぬぬ、無視とはひどいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Tsk-tsk, it's terrible to ignore me like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Tsk-tsk, it's terrible to ignore me like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 音は耳に入れない。ノイズは目にしない。
MESSAGE.EN: Covering up my ears and closing my eyes in order to avoid letting in anything unnecessary,
MESSAGE.Translation: Covering up my ears and closing my eyes in order to avoid letting in anything unnecessary,

MESSAGE.JP: はひたすらに、忘れないことだけを考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I was desperately struggling not to forget Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was desperately struggling not to forget Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: とりで頑張ると、僕は恭介に誓ったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had promised Kyousuke that I would do it on my own.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had promised Kyousuke that I would do it on my own.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「昨日のお弁当箱、返して欲しいんだけどなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Will you give me back my lunch box?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Will you give me back my lunch box?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あれがないと、お弁当作れないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I need it to make lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I need it to make lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「せっかく、今日はおにぎりにしようと思ってたのにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I was planning on making rice balls for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I was planning on making rice balls for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ご飯をまあるく握って、ウメボシ入れて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Molding rice into a neat ball, and inserting a pickled Japanese plum into it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Molding rice into a neat ball, and inserting a pickled Japanese plum into it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ねえ、理樹君はウメボシ好き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Say, Riki-kun, you like Japanese plums?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Say, Riki-kun, you like Japanese plums?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「実はあたしは苦手なんだよねえ。うー、思い出しただけで口の中がすっぱくなってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Actually, I don't really like them. Woo, just thinking about them makes me feel like there's a sour taste in my mouth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Actually, I don't really like them. Woo, just thinking about them makes me feel like there's a sour taste in my mouth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「あはは、唾がでてきちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, some saliva just came out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, some saliva just came out.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝The human body is full of mysteries, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝The human body is full of mysteries, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「これぞまさに女体の神秘」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝And this is a mystery of nothing less than a woman's body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝And this is a mystery of nothing less than a woman's body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「なんてねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hmmph, this is so boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hmmph, this is so boring.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Still not saying a word, I took her lunch box out of my school bag and placed it on my desk.

MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ah, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ah, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「じゃあ、明日はお弁当ちゃんと作ってくるからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm making lunch for you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm making lunch for you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「楽しみにしててよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Look forward to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Look forward to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥@「ねえ、いつまでそうするつもりなの？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Come on, how long are you going to keep that up?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Until tonight? Tomorrow? A month ahead? And even a year?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...I know you're trying to keep her in your mind, but it's not going to change anything.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'd advise that you just quit struggling and forget her now.❞
